Employee Handbook:

Welcome to the EMP training guide! It is important that all users understand the basic functionality of EMP before attempting to use the software, else serious accidents may occur.

First you must //MISSING TEXT//

In emergencies you must never //CORRUPTED DATA//

Finally, the most basic way to navigate through EMP is to click the auto-generated links between memories. If you are confused and not sure where to go, just click and you'll no doubt find the way forward!

Thank you for your time. We all here at Peace Directive are committed to a working environment that is //MISSING TEXT//

(Any unauthorized distribution of the Handbook to the public is strictly forbidden.)

(Addendum: A twine game about an hour long. Click links and make choices.)
